**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p>The <b>blue mussel</b> (<i><b>Mytilus edulis</b></i>), also known as the <b>common mussel</b>, is a medium-sized edible marine bivalve mollusc in the family Mytilidae, the mussels. Blue mussels are subject to commercial use and intensive aquaculture. A species with a large range, empty shells are commonly found on beaches around the world.
